content: ppiinneeaappppllee aaffgghhaann directions given for an afghan measur- round 5 slip_stitch in next st slip_stitch ch3 double_crochet ch3 2dc in ing 55 x 72 next ch3 space *@ ch2 skip next 2dc single_crochet in next double_crochet ch3 7 times single_crochet in next double_crochet ch2 @ materials 4 ply worsted weight yarn 2dc ch3 2dc in next ch3 space repeat from * twice then 3 5 oz skein repeat from @ to @ once join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of 12 skeins of off white a first ch3 2 skeins of border color b round 6 slip_stitch in next st slip_stitch ch3 double_crochet ch3 2dc in crochet hook size h or any size hook next ch3 space *@ ch2 skip next 2dc and next ch2 space to obtain gauge below single_crochet in next ch3 space ch3 6 times single_crochet in next ch3 space gauge each square - 17 x 17 ch2 skip next ch2 space and next 2dc @ 2dc ch3 2dc note afghan is made up of 12-16 squares in next ch3 space repeat from * twice then repeat from which are sown together afterwards @ to @ once join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of first ch3 afghan can be made bigger by making round 7 ch3 double_crochet in next double_crochet *@ 2dc ch3 2dc in more squares next ch3 space double_crochet in each of next 2dc ch3 skip next ch2 space single_crochet in next ch3 space ch3 6 times skip next ch2 space @ square make 12 starting at center with a ch4 double_crochet in each of next 2dc repeat from * twice then repeat join with slip_stitch to form ring from @ to @ once join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg round 1 ch2 dc15 in ring ch3 now and throughout unless otherwise speci- round 2 slip_stitch in next st slip_stitch ch2 double_crochet ch2 2dc in be- fied tween next stitch * skip next 2dc then 2dc ch2 2dc round 8 chain 3 double_crochet in base of chain beg increase made double_crochet in in between next stitch repeat from * 7 times join with each of next 3dc * @ 2dc ch3 2dc in next ch3 slip_stitch in third chain from beg ch3 you should have 8 shells space double_crochet in each of next 3dc 2dc in next double_crochet increase made around ch3 skip next ch3 space single_crochet in next ch3 space ch3 5 times round 3 slip_stitch in next st slip_stitch ch3 double_crochet ch3 2dc in next skip next ch3 space @ increase in next double_crochet double_crochet in each of next chain 2 space * skip next 4 double_crochet 8dc in next ch2 space skip next 4dc 3dc repeat from * twice then repeat from @ to @ once 2dc ch3 2dc in next ch2 space repeat from * twice skip round 9 ch3 double_crochet in base of chain double_crochet in each of next next 4dc 8dc in next ch2 space join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of 6dc * @ 2dc ch3
